content:
For the below slices in the EOB pharmacy profile the supportingInfo.code binding is required but the valueset shows 0 values ;can the value set be provided

  1. supportingInfo:brandgenericcode -> Binding: NCPDP Brand Generic Indicator (required)
  2. supportingInfo:clmrecvddate -> Binding: NCPDP Prescription Origin Code (required)
  3. supportingInfo:compoundcode -> Binding: NCPDP Compound Code (required)

The IG shows 0 codes in the valueSet because HL7 has not provided an expansion of the codes included within. Usually this is the case where HL7 does not have the rights to reproduce the codes and descriptions in the IG. An implementer will have to acquire the appropriate license for a copy of the relevant specifications. The IG includes copyright information and links for each terminology.

You can send the NCPDP CODES with data set. We have another thread of conversation I did with NCPDP and team. You can not share the complete NCPDP code set. The source and receiving entity to be followed NCPDP policies to get full codeset.
